java/liquibase/database/sql/AddAutoIncrementStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00005 
00006 public class AddAutoIncrementStatement implements SqlStatement {
00007 
00008     private String schemaName;
00009     private String tableName;
00010     private String columnName;
00011     private String columnDataType;
00012 
00013     public AddAutoIncrementStatement(String schemaName, String tableName, String columnName, String columnDataType) {
00014         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00015         this.tableName = tableName;
00016         this.columnName = columnName;
00017         this.columnDataType = columnDataType;
00018     }
00019 
00020     public String getSchemaName() {
00021         return schemaName;
00022     }
00023 
00024     public String getTableName() {
00025         return tableName;
00026     }
00027 
00028     public String getColumnName() {
00029         return columnName;
00030     }
00031 
00032     public String getColumnDataType() {
00033         return columnDataType;
00034     }
00035 
00036     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00037         return !(database instanceof OracleDatabase
00038                 || database instanceof MSSQLDatabase
00039                 || database instanceof DerbyDatabase
00040                 || database instanceof CacheDatabase
00041                 || database instanceof FirebirdDatabase
00042                 || database instanceof H2Database
00043                 || database instanceof PostgresDatabase);
00044     }
00045 
00046     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00047         if (!supportsDatabase(database)) {
00048             throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException(this, database);
00049         }
00050 
00051         if (database instanceof HsqlDatabase) {
00052             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN " + getColumnName() + " " + getColumnDataType() + " GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY IDENTITY";
00053         } else if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00054             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN " + getColumnName() + " SET GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY";
00055         }
00056 
00057         return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " MODIFY " + getColumnName() + " " + getColumnDataType() + " AUTO_INCREMENT";
00058     }
00059 
00060     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00061         return ";";
00062     }
00063 }
